verses.verse: Behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> maketh the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1238>empty<s%>, and maketh it <S%H1110>waste<s%>, and <S%H5753>turneth<s%> it upside <S%H6440>down<s%>, and scattereth <S%H6327>abroad<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof.

And it shall be, as with the <S%H5971>people<s%>, so with the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; as with the <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so with his <S%H113>master<s%>; as with the <S%H8198>maid<s%>, so with her <S%H1404>mistress<s%>; as with the <S%H7069>buyer<s%>, so with the <S%H4376>seller<s%>; as with the <S%H3867>lender<s%>, so with the <S%H3867>borrower<s%>; as with the taker of <S%H5383>usury<s%>, <S%H834>so<s%> with the giver of <S%H5378>usury<s%> to him.
The <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H1238>utterly<s%> <S%H1238>emptied<s%>, and <S%H962>utterly<s%> <S%H962>spoiled<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%> and fadeth <S%H5034>away<s%>, the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%> and fadeth <S%H5034>away<s%>, the <S%H4791>haughty<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> do <S%H535>languish<s%>.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> also is <S%H2610>defiled<s%> under the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof; because they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H8451>laws<s%>, <S%H2498>changed<s%> the <S%H2706>ordinance<s%>, <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

Therefore hath the <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein are <S%H816>desolate<s%>: therefore the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%>, and <S%H4213>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%>.
The new <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%>, the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>, all the <S%H8056%H3820>merryhearted<s%> do <S%H584>sigh<s%>.

The <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%>, the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of them that <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> <S%H2308>endeth<s%>, the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3658>harp<s%> <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%>.
They shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H7892>song<s%>; strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> shall be <S%H4843>bitter<s%> to them that <S%H8354>drink<s%> it.
The <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion<s%> is broken <S%H7665>down<s%>: every <S%H1004>house<s%> is shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, that no man may come <S%H935>in<s%>.
There is a <S%H6682>crying<s%> for <S%H3196>wine<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>; all <S%H8057>joy<s%> is <S%H6150>darkened<s%>, the <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1540>gone<s%>.
In the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H8047>desolation<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gate<s%> is <S%H3807>smitten<s%> with <S%H7591>destruction<s%>.

¶ When thus it shall be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, there shall be as the <S%H5363>shaking<s%> of an olive <S%H2132>tree<s%>, and as the gleaning <S%H5955>grapes<s%> when the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> is <S%H3615>done<s%>.

They shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, they shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, they shall cry <S%H6670>aloud<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3513>glorify<s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H217>fires<s%>, even the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

¶ From the uttermost <S%H3671>part<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have we <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%>, even <S%H6643>glory<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>. But I <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H7334>leanness<s%>, my <S%H7334>leanness<s%>, <S%H188>woe<s%> unto me! the treacherous <S%H898>dealers<s%> have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%>; yea, the treacherous <S%H898>dealers<s%> have dealt <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>.
<S%H6343>Fear<s%>, and the <S%H6354>pit<s%>, and the <S%H6341>snare<s%>, are upon thee, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that he who <S%H5127>fleeth<s%> from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6343>fear<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6354>pit<s%>; and he that cometh <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6354>pit<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare<s%>: for the <S%H699>windows<s%> from on <S%H4791>high<s%> are <S%H6605>open<s%>, and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> do <S%H7493>shake<s%>.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7489>utterly<s%> broken <S%H7489>down<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H6565>clean<s%> <S%H6565>dissolved<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4131>moved<s%> <S%H4131>exceedingly<s%>.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5128>reel<s%> to and <S%H5128>fro<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunkard<s%>, and shall be <S%H5110>removed<s%> like a <S%H4412>cottage<s%>; and the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> thereof shall be <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon it; and it shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and not <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the high <S%H4791>ones<s%> that are on <S%H4791>high<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

And they shall be gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, as <S%H616>prisoners<s%> are <S%H626>gathered<s%> in the <S%H953>pit<s%>, and shall be shut <S%H5462>up<s%> in the <S%H4525>prison<s%>, and after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they be <S%H6485>visited<s%>.

Then the <S%H3842>moon<s%> shall be <S%H2659>confounded<s%>, and the <S%H2535>sun<s%> <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and before his <S%H2205>ancients<s%> <S%H3519>gloriously<s%>.
